Review_title: A Visual Pilgrimage Through The World of Lambic.
Review_Text: "Bottle Conditioned" takes the viewer on a journey through the trials and tribulations of 3 Major lambic producers. The film perfectly encapsulates the rich history and passion of traditional lambic brewing. Educative and informative all while being a visual masterpiece. Jerry Franck pulls back the curtain to reveal the relatively hidden world of lambic and all it's nuances. Coming from someone who has followed this niche style of beer for the past 5 years, I can say the authenticity is next to perfect. "Bottle Conditioned" is everything I had hoped for and more. This exceeded any expectations I had; would recommend this to any beer lover.

Review_title: Thoughtful insight into the world of Belgian Lambic Beer
Review_Text: Bottle Conditioned" is an insightful and captivating documentary that delves into the fascinating world of Belgian Lambic beers. The film offers an in-depth look at the traditional brewing methods, unique fermentation process, and the current state of lambic production in Belgium. Through interviews with prominent lambic producers from Bokke, Cantillon, and 3 Fontenien, the film provides a detailed understanding of the complexities of balancing tradition and brewing these highly sought-after beers. With stunning cinematography and a compelling narrative, "Bottle Conditioned" is a must-watch for beer enthusiasts and anyone interested in the lambic.
